text: We'll hear argument now in No. 87-1022, Board of Estimate of the City of New York v. Beverly Morris; No. 87-1112, Frank Ponterio v. Beverly Morris.
Good afternoon, Mr. Chief Justice, and may it please the Court.
Mr. Zimroth, is the Board of Estimate created by the state legislature in New York, or what entity creates the Board and fixes the boundaries and determines its composition?
Mr. Chief Justice, may it please the Court.
